titles: The valiant souldiers gallantry, or, The glory of the camp-royal, on Hounslow-Heath. To the tune of, Hark! the thundering cannons roar.
notes: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Dated in ms. below title: "8 July. 1686."
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
